title: unexpected error has occured
body: Last night I was able to play just fine, now when I attempt to log into the client I get this message: "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. Can anyone help with this?

replies.body: A connection block may be in the way here, blocking you from reaching the authentication server.  Could be due to your network, but antivirus or firewall settings can serve as the culprit too.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help auto configure your firewall settings.  Go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to help troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have used the hextech repair tool for the firewall, have turned off the firewall, have reinstalled game via the tool and repatched. checked hard drive for errors, updated windows, still not working. I don't understand whats going on because it was working for me just last night.

If the steps didn't work, not to worry.  Grab the logs provided by the HRT and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you directly and figure out what's blocking your network from reaching us.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
I've done both of these and still no dice.
I've had the same issue for a week now. Hope for a quick fix.
